product_name: Spark R&D Verts Snowshoes with Spark Adapters
long_description: When skinning isn't an option, post-holing shouldn't be either. Spark R&D has collaborated with Verts to offer a split-friendly climbing alternative--the first ever splitboard-specific snowshoes.
short_description: When skinning isn't an option, post-holing shouldn't be either. Spark R&D has collaborated with Verts to offer a split-friendly climbing alternative--the first ever splitboard-specific snowshoes.
